reviews.text: This is a cute B&B which aims to please. They are located on a quiet street in Palermo which is within walking distance to shops, restaurants, nightlife and the subway but not too close to be loud all the time. The staff is very attentive and provide a lot of information on the city and attractions. Local calls are free as well as internet (only one computer in the hotel). The rooms are small but well maintained and have air-conditioning. It is important to confirm your reservation in advance as they lost ours and we had to do quite a bit of reshuffling. They have an outdoor patio space and a sun-deck, which are ideal to sharing a bottle of Malbec.
reviews.title: Cute B&B in great neighborhood on quiet street

likes.liked: — Very accommodating, walk to nightlife, quiet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent two nights in Solar Soler B&B, last december.This B&B is a marvellous place and we absolutely loved it.The location in Palermo Hollywood is perfect, very close to metro, restaurants and shops, in a quiet street. The house is very cosy, and charming, the rooms quiet and confortable, with a nice terrace where you can stay in the shade of a vine...The atmosphere is really friendly and the hosts, Victoria and Juan, helpful and always ready to give, with a smile, recommandations and good advice regarding the choice of restaurants, good music or visits. We enjoyed a lot our time and would recommand this B&B to all.
reviews.title: Solar Soler: a lovely place with excellent staff!

likes.disliked: — to stay only 2 nights and to have no enough time to listen to Ernesto, the guitar player

reviews.title: Great location, hip neighoborhood, quaint rooms - must stay here!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had a wonderful time in Buenos Aires and this was a lovely, cozy place to rest our heads!
reviews.title: a gr8 experience

reviews.text: The staff was very helpful and always available (even helped find crutched for my mom after a knee twisting accident!); the rooms are tastefully decorated and cozy (although a little musty); the breakfast and "living room" areas as well as the outside courtyard patio and deck made for wonderful "downtime" spaces; the location is great - 6 blocks from Palermo Soho's shops and cafes, a few blocks from Santa Fe and the metro...
reviews.title: A Must Stay

likes.liked: — I felt like this place was my apartment rather than just another hotel...cozy!
likes.disliked: — I wish I could stay longer...its popular so book early!

reviews.title: Fantastic B&B
reviews.text: A great Bed and Breakfast in Palermo. The rooms are individually furnished, a nice patio and a great staff. Around the corner are Palermo's chic shows and restaurants.

reviews.title: A special place in Palermo Hollywood
